title: Training on Mathematics Lesson Design Using Digital Educational Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and fundamental knowledge of secondary-level mathematics education
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service and in-service teachers to enhance digital educational tool competencies and improve mathematics lesson design skills through collaborative learning

learning_goals: Participants can design math concept visualization activities using digital backpacks (hardware/software)
Participants can develop digital tool-based math lesson scenarios through collaborative learning with peer teachers
Participants can analyze digital tool application cases in online environments and create action plans for implementation in their own classes

resources: Digital Backpack Set (Tablet, Educational Software Licenses)
Digital content templates for math education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
